attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given the growing use of Americanisms in our language, is it time to limit the amount of American influence in our lives? Our children are bombarded by American ‘culture’ from an early age as there are no longer many British children’s programmes. British films are heavily outnumbered by big budget Hollywood blockbusters which show life mainly from an American angle.

Even though Microsoft can publish software in dozens of languages, they still cannot do it in English. ‘Color’ and ‘ Favorites’ are just two words that leap out at you in Windows. We have Drive Thru, all nite cafes, meters, and licenses. Solicitors have vanished to be replaced by Lawyers. The list is endless.

Should we follow the French example and introduce legislation to protect our language and culture?
